actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1502 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that eligibility requirements for Vietnam era veterans shall conform with those afforded World War II and Korean conflict veterans.

summary.text: Provides that eligibility requirements for Vietnam era veterans in need of vocational rehabilitation on account of a service-connected disability shall conform with those afforded World War II and Korean conflict veterans. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1502 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1502 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that eligibility requirements for Vietnam era veterans shall conform with those afforded World War II and Korean conflict veterans.
